name: Kid's Adventures
description:
Its a simple Adventure game like Mario or other games.

In this game there are red and blue ants, slugs, dino's and a green man with an axe. You have to escape from then and also from flying blade at level 5.

When you start the game It will not activate gun. You have to jump over the enemies to destroy them. For the gun you have to come on second level. Use Spacebar to shoot.  the bullets will increase in size as they go forward. And get deleted after some distance.

Use right, left and up keys to control the player. You also have to escape from water and spiky balls. 

Collect gold coins and diamonds to score. At initial your score will be 15 you have to make it large. At the last level you will get red and yellow icecreams to get cool down. Take minimum time time to score more.
